snippet.title: Pecaminosa - Cinematic Trailer
snippet.description:
Available on Steam (https://bit.ly/PecaminosaSteam​) and Nintendo Switch (https://bit.ly/PecaSwitch).

Coming soon to PlayStation 4 and Xbox One.

Pecaminosa is a Pixel Noir Game where you play as John Souza, a former police detective, caught in a web of lies and femme fatales, on a journey for redemption. Cliché? Just like we want it! 

With a mysterious environment brought to life through pixel art and an original vintage jazz soundtrack, this Police Action RPG strives to surprise you base trough an intense, humoristic and challenging narrative.



 Features:



 - Film Noir Ambience with a Pixel Art look. 

 - Different gameplay approaches: brute force to pure luck!! 

 - Play Poker and BlackJack at the Casinos

 - Lots of guns and apparel to fight in… style! 

 - Solve the mystery, save your soul!



Follow Pecaminosa: 

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pecaminosagame/ 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Pecaminosagame 

Website: https://pecaminosa.com/
